Text.val: Author : Christian Overhoff
Creation: 2005
27.01.0214 GB SCR18659 3 Added 3 checkboxes at the bottom of the screen: All history, Only Legal documents, Only External notes
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
14.03.2012 GB SCR17173 Calculated the Method, Recipient in thr OID705F2 with BID705
08.03.2012 GB SCR17173 Added the new version of OID705F2
19.04.2100 AK SCR15480 add sent method to dunning history (Post/Fax/Email)
29.04.2009 SH SCR14580 Restructured program to show notes and
tamino documents
14.11.2008 GB SCR14092 Added task GetAndSaveWindowPosition
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Archived docs: Replaced call of separate GM104 by GM100
14.12.2007 SH SCR12862 Changed selection of CODE to present
Recipient (new field DUNH_DOCTYPE)
12.05.2006 CO changed internal variable names for better readability
09.05.2006 CO SCR11198 corrected windows title name display
06.04.2006 AS Testscreen/button "Overview", SCR#10573
25.03.2006 AK SCR10716 call BID705 before calling the online program
-- 3 checkboxes at the bottom of the screen
Search, if at least 1 record exists:
-- 3 checkboxes at the bottom of the screen
-- Get window position
Delete empty window record, just in case:
(Happens, when there are no records first time using the module.)
No records at all:
-- Save window position
-- set
-- get
-- 3 checkboxes at the bottom of the screen
Default: let the window be open, when leaving:
Enable printing the screen:
Save present windows size and position:
Save pointer to the current row:
Switch off printing screen button:
-- Determine if scans / documents / notes / duning letters have to be presented
... scanned documents present
... notes present
... perhaps also Tamino documents
... dunning letters present
... tamino documents present
-- Close previous screens
Reset Mouse cursor after view update:
Close event is propergated, to realy close the window after the handler!
Put Offset back to default value for next time using this modul:
Close subwindows also, (in case there are open ones at all):
OID706E1_N: Note:
OID706E1_L: Dunning letters:
Control verification: Date
Date has to be at least 1 year in the past!:
Control handler: Date change.
Can take a while to recalulate the description:
Get or update dunning history description for every row:
-- Refresh display of notes and dunning letters (= internal online programs)
Call all refresh
I.) Open all those document windows, that are necessary, close the others:
CALLPROG note (return parameter!):
if document available but window close or no document available but window open:
CALLPROG dunning_letter (return parameter!):
if document available but window close or no document available but window open:
Previous Date - Button
Can take a while to recalulate the description:
Show notes beginning with 1 former year:
Get or update dunning history description for every row:
Enlarge the range:
Refresh the screen with new records:
Next Date - Button
Can take a while to recalulate the description:
Show notes beginning with 1 later year:
If current date were too young, it is corrected automatically:
Get or update dunning history description for every row:

SQL_STMT_U.val: select year(dunh_date), cast(count(*) as integer) from :1/dunh where dunh_debc_no=:2 group by year(dunh_date) order by year(dunh_date) desc

Text.val: -- 3 checkboxes at the bottom of the screen
Default: let the window be open, when leaving:
Enable printing the screen:
Save present windows size and position:
Save pointer to the current row:
Switch off printing screen button:
-- Determine if scans / documents / notes / duning letters have to be presented
... scanned documents present
... notes present
... perhaps also Tamino documents
... dunning letters present
... tamino documents present
-- Close previous screens
Reset Mouse cursor after view update:
Close event is propergated, to realy close the window after the handler!
Put Offset back to default value for next time using this modul:
Close subwindows also, (in case there are open ones at all):
OID706E1_N: Note:
OID706E1_L: Dunning letters:
Control verification: Date
Date has to be at least 1 year in the past!:
Control handler: Date change.
Can take a while to recalulate the description:
Get or update dunning history description for every row:
-- Refresh display of notes and dunning letters (= internal online programs)
Call all refresh
I.) Open all those document windows, that are necessary, close the others:
CALLPROG note (return parameter!):
if document available but window close or no document available but window open:
CALLPROG dunning_letter (return parameter!):
if document available but window close or no document available but window open:
Previous Date - Button
Can take a while to recalulate the description:
Show notes beginning with 1 former year:
Get or update dunning history description for every row:
Enlarge the range:
Refresh the screen with new records:
Next Date - Button
Can take a while to recalulate the description:
Show notes beginning with 1 later year:
If current date were too young, it is corrected automatically:
Get or update dunning history description for every row:

SQL_STMT_U.val: select year(dunh_date), cast(count(*) as integer) from :1/dunh where dunh_debc_no=:2 group by year(dunh_date) order by year(dunh_date) desc
